app.name: C@VE
app.long_description:
You (@) found Hykem's Dog (d) in a deep, dark cave and now must return her to him! Avoid traps (*) and make sure his dog stays full by feeding it food (F) so it doesn't starve to death! Maybe he will be so grateful, that he will bestow upon you IOSU hacks! Search for hidden doors and traps with Y and drink potions (p) to restore your health!
Meta and Icon by Pwsincd.
